title: Blow Your Mind 2.0
desc: Re-factored this project into react application.  The goal was to write the application using React hooks only (classless) and to utilize useContext / useReducer to simulate Redux's global state feature.

title: Portfolio 2020
desc: Current version of the portfolio uses React/Webpack for front-end server and Express for back-end API requests.

title: Gallery of Horns
desc: A gallery app made using ES6, handlebars, jQuery.  It utilizes json files to populate gallery items.

title: Book App
desc: This is a web app that allows users to query Google Book API and store / edit their favorite entries into a postgres database using SQL.

title: Bus Mall
desc: This small app takes user inputs and displays the data as chart.

title: KEXP Clash Day 2019
desc: This is a single page application for client KEXP.  I was responsible for CSS layout and responsive styling.

title: KEXP Annual Report 2017
desc: Annual report site for client KEXP.  I was responsible for all styling and functionalities in programming highlight page.

title: Publicis Website
desc: Wordpress customization and maintenance for my previous company website.
